mapper.select: SELECT m.`id`, m.`menuName` AS title, m.icon, m.`url` AS href, FALSE AS spread FROM `sys_menu` m WHERE m.`pid` = #{pid} AND m.`id` IN ( SELECT DISTINCT rm.`menuId` FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.`roleId` = rm.`roleId` WHERE ur.`userId` = #{uid} ) ORDER BY sort ASC
